about_the_game:
Buckle up and see the journey Dark Future: Blood Red States has gone on.

The Developer’s Archive shows you the way the game has changed and developed since it started development in 2014. This DLC doesn’t add any new content to the main Dark Future: Blood Red States game, but instead includes:

  • Eight different playable builds of the game
  • The initial pitch videos for the game
  • PDFs describing the builds, their development state, and the thinking at the time about the game

As a special thank you we’ve also included these free gifts to provide further context for the game’s development:

  • A PDF of the original rules to the board game Dark Future
  • A PDF of the original expansion, Dark Future: White Line Fever
  • A PDF of the Dark Future novel - Golgotha Run

Buckle up and see the journey Dark Future: Blood Red States has gone on.

The Developer’s Archive shows you the way the game has changed and developed since it started development in 2014. This DLC doesn’t add any new content to the main Dark Future: Blood Red States game, but instead includes:

  • Eight different playable builds of the game

  • PDFs describing the builds, their development state, and the thinking at the time about the game

As a special thank you we’ve also included these free gifts to provide further context for the game’s development:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible GPU with 1GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.5GHz Intel i5 / i7 Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 / OpenGL Compatible GPU (GTX 980 or greater)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 21 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950
